content.question: The licensing of trade described in the passage is an example of which of the following state policies?

choices.label: The monopolization of force by the state
The preservation of regional autonomy and tax collection
The implementation of mercantilism to promote the state’s economic interests
The development of new banking techniques to enhance commerce

content.answer: The implementation of mercantilism to promote the state’s economic interests
